name: Let's Hop
overview: The premise is your are in a spaceship that is low on gas and cruising over the gas tanks of a planet to replenish. Unfortunately you can only refuel enough for one "hop" at a time, so the path you pick over the tanks must be made carefully so you stay supplied. There are two versions of the game as it was updated after first released - the second has a more distinctive custom font on the title screen.
